examples: Always chew food well before swallowing it.
Mastique bien los alimentos antes de tragarlos.
I had a sore throat and it hurt to swallow.
Tenía dolor de garganta y me dolía tragar.
The pills should be swallowed whole.
She swallowed hard and told him the bad news.
Ella tragó saliva y le contó las malas noticias.
